argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumrecl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumrecl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumrecl.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumrecl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 5 |  | isumrecl.5 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 6 |  | isumge0.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 7 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 5 | #P_isumclim2 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> sum_ k e. Z A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( j = k -> ( F ` j ) = ( F ` k ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_cbvsumv | |- sum_ j e. Z ( F ` j ) = sum_ k e. Z ( F ` k ) |
| 11 | 3 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z ( F ` k ) = sum_ k e. Z A ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. Z ( F ` j ) = sum_ k e. Z A ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> sum_ j e. Z ( F ` j ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) |
| 15 | 6, 3 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> 0 <_ ( F ` k ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 13, 14, 15 | #P_iserge0 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ sum_ j e. Z ( F ` j ) ) |
| 17 | 16, 12 | #P_breqtrd | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ sum_ k e. Z A ) |
